name: Omni Kitchen & Bar
address: 9044 Glover Rd, Langley Twp, BC V1M, Canada

hasMenuItem.name: Chicken Bites
hasMenuItem.description:
In-house, rice-battered, fried chicken thighs served with Omni sauce. Make them spicy or season with salt & pepper.

*These are gluten-free!

hasMenuItem.name: Classic Mac & Cheese
hasMenuItem.description:
House-made cheese sauce, lumache noodles, topped with bread crumbs and served with rosemary focaccia.

Make it gluten-free and/or add truffle oil parmesan, mushrooms, or bacon for an additional charge.

hasMenuItem.name: Cheeseburger
hasMenuItem.description:
Local ground beef, aged cheddar, lettuce, tomato, omni sauce, served on a brioche style bun,  with hand-cut kennebec fries.

Upgrades including gluten free bun and salads for an additional charge.

hasMenuItem.name: Hand-Cut Fries
hasMenuItem.description:
Hand-cut kennebec potato fries. 

Add truffle parmesan, cajun honey (photo), or gravy for an additional charge.

hasMenuItem.name: Margherita Pizza
hasMenuItem.description:
Neapolitan style pizza, with tomato sauce, bocconcini, parmesan, basil and garlic.

Substitute Gluten-Free for an additional charge.

hasMenuItem.name: Mini Mac & Cheese
hasMenuItem.description:
House-made cheese sauce, lumache noodles, topped with bread crumbs and served with rosemary focaccia.

Make it gluten-free and/or add truffle oil parmesan, mushrooms, bacon, chicken for an additional charge..

hasMenuItem.name: Spicy Chicken Burger
hasMenuItem.description:
In-house, rice-battered fried chicken thigh tossed in hot sauce, shredded lettuce, bread + butter pickles, omni sauce, on a brioche style bun, served with hand-cut kennebec fries.

Upgrades including gluten free bun and salads for an additional charge.

hasMenuItem.name: Truffled Mushroom Pizza
hasMenuItem.description:
Neaplitan style pizza with tomato sauce, a roasted mushroom blend, truffle oil, mozzarella, and parmesan.

Substitute for a Gluten-Free crust for an additional charge.

hasMenuItem.name: Plant-based Mac & Cheese
hasMenuItem.description:
Plant-based cheese sauce, lumache noodles, topped with bread crumbs and served with rosemary focaccia.

Add truffle oil & plant-based parmesan, mushrooms, or plant-based bacon for an additional charge.

hasMenuItem.name: Chicken Burger
hasMenuItem.description:
In-house, rice-battered fried chicken thigh, lettuce, tomato, omni sauce, on a brioche bun, served with hand-cut kennebec fries.

Upgrades including gluten free bun and salads for an additional charge.

hasMenuItem.name: Spicy Pepperoni Pizza
hasMenuItem.description:
Neapolitan style pizza with tomato sauce, pepperoni, mozzarella, chili oil, chili flakes and parmesan

Substitute for a Gluten-Free crust for an additional charge.

hasMenuItem.name: Double Cheeseburger
hasMenuItem.description:
Two local ground beef patties, two slices of aged cheddar, lettuce, tomato, omni sauce, served on a brioche style bun,  with hand-cut kennebec fries.

Upgrades including gluten free bun and salads for an additional charge.

hasMenuItem.name: Budweiser (341ml)
hasMenuItem.description: Bottle

hasMenuItem.name: Backyard Vineyards - Patio Cab/Merlot (750mL)
hasMenuItem.description: Medium full-bodied sunset sipper, black cherry, smoke, light pepper. A perfect pairing for our comfort menu items.

hasMenuItem.name: Corona (330ml)
hasMenuItem.description: Bottle

hasMenuItem.name: Stella (330ml)
hasMenuItem.description: Bottle

hasMenuItem.name: Tom Gore Cabernet Sauvignon, 750mL
hasMenuItem.description: Typically features dark chocolate and dark fruits with a well-balanced, medium finish.

hasMenuItem.name: Chaberton Bacchus, 750mL
hasMenuItem.description: Typically features notes of green apple, citrus, and a hint of floral aroma. Balanced acidity and a smooth finish.

hasMenuItem.name: Lonetree Cider (335ml)
hasMenuItem.description: Lonetree Dry Apple Cider

hasMenuItem.name: Tom Gore Chardonnay, 750mL
hasMenuItem.description: A balanced white wine with notes of crisp apple and pear, complemented by subtle hints of oak and a smooth finish.

hasMenuItem.name: PBR Lager (355ml Can)
hasMenuItem.description: clean, crisp, classic.

hasMenuItem.name: Backyard Vineyards - Patio Pinot Gris (750mL)
hasMenuItem.description: Crisp orchard fruit, tropical tones, and semi-dry finish. A perfect pairing for our comfort menu items.

hasMenuItem.name: Chicken Bites
hasMenuItem.description:
In-house, rice-battered, fried chicken thighs served with Omni sauce. Make them spicy or season with salt & pepper.

*These are gluten-free!

hasMenuItem.name: Poutine
hasMenuItem.description:
Hand-cut fries covered in a delicious mushroom-based gravy & cheese curds. 

Add mushrooms or bacon for an additional charge.

hasMenuItem.name: Mini Mac & Cheese
hasMenuItem.description:
House-made cheese sauce, lumache noodles, topped with bread crumbs and served with rosemary focaccia.

Make it gluten-free and/or add truffle oil parmesan, mushrooms, bacon, chicken for an additional charge..

hasMenuItem.name: Plant-Based Poutine
hasMenuItem.description:
Hand-cut fries covered in a delicious mushroom-based gravy & plant-based cheese curds. 

Add mushrooms or plant-based bacon, chicken or extra cheese curds for an additional charge.

hasMenuItem.name: Hand-Cut Fries
hasMenuItem.description:
Hand-cut kennebec potato fries. 

Add truffle parmesan, cajun honey (photo), or gravy for an additional charge.

hasMenuItem.name: Plant-Based Chicken Bites
hasMenuItem.description:
In-house, rice-battered, fried jackfruit served with Omni sauce. Make them spicy or season with salt & pepper.

*These are gluten-free!

hasMenuItem.name: Plant-Based Mini Mac & Cheese
hasMenuItem.description:
House-made PB cheese sauce, lumache noodles, topped with bread crumbs and served with rosemary focaccia.

Make it Gluten-Free and/or add truffle oil parmesan, mushrooms, bacon, chicken for an additional charge.

hasMenuItem.name: Crispy Chicken Wings
hasMenuItem.description:
In-house, rice-battered fried chicken thighs served with Omni sauce. Make them spicy, salt & pepper, or cajun honey.

*These are gluten-free!

hasMenuItem.name: Spicy Pepperoni Pizza
hasMenuItem.description:
Neapolitan style pizza with tomato sauce, pepperoni, mozzarella, chili oil, chili flakes and parmesan

Substitute for a Gluten-Free crust for an additional charge.

hasMenuItem.name: Truffled Mushroom Pizza
hasMenuItem.description:
Neaplitan style pizza with tomato sauce, a roasted mushroom blend, truffle oil, mozzarella, and parmesan.

Substitute for a Gluten-Free crust for an additional charge.

hasMenuItem.name: Margherita Pizza
hasMenuItem.description:
Neapolitan style pizza, with tomato sauce, bocconcini, parmesan, basil and garlic.

Substitute Gluten-Free for an additional charge.

hasMenuItem.name: Plant-Based Margherita Pizza
hasMenuItem.description:
Neapolitan style pizza, with tomato sauce, house-made, plant-based bocconcini, plant-based parmesan, basil and garlic.

Substitute Gluten-Free for an additional charge.

hasMenuItem.name: Four Cheese PIzza
hasMenuItem.description:
Neapolitan style pizza with tomato sauce, mozzarella, cheddar, bocconcini, and parmesan topped with garlic oil. 

Substitute for a Gluten-Free crust for an additional charge

hasMenuItem.name: Plant-Based Spicy Pepperoni Pizza
hasMenuItem.description:
Neapolitan style pizza with tomato sauce, plant-based pepperoni, plant-based cheese,  chili oil, chili flakes and plant-based parmesan

Substitute for a Gluten-Free crust for an additional charge. 

***Please be advised, the plant-based pepperoni currently contains gluten. ***

hasMenuItem.name: Plant-Based Truffled Mushroom Pizza
hasMenuItem.description:
Neapolitan style pizza with tomato sauce, a roasted mushroom blend, truffle oil, plant-based mozzarella, and plant-based parmesan.

Substitute for a Gluten-Free crust for an additional charge.

hasMenuItem.name: Omni Bowl
hasMenuItem.description:
Mixed greens, quinoa, tomatoes, black beans, corn, avocado, citrus vinaigrette, chipotle honey lime aioli.

Add chicken or plant-based chicken. 

*If you would prefer us to use agave rather than honey, please make a note for us.

review.reviewBody: Delicious! We love the pizza and burgers. Such great ingredients and awesome owners!
The plant based chicken burgers were okay but the poutine, tom boc salad, and cajun honey fries left a lot to be desired for the price. Small portions for everything, probably will not order again
